text: ve aise hain, jo tauba karate hain, bandagee karate hai, stuti karate hain, (allaah ke maarg mein) bhraman karate hain, (allaah ke aage) jhukate hai, sajada karate hai, bhalaee ka hukm dete hai aur buraee se rokate hain aur allaah kee nirdhaarit seemaon kee raksha karate hain -aur in eemaanavaalon ko shubh-soochana de do
